attributes.action: consider allowing retirement at either 65 years of age or when 40 years of contributions have been paid, which ever is the sooner.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For those people who start work at 17/18 years old they will have worked for a minimum of 48/49 years before they are entitled to benefit from their retirement pension.  Whereas if the above scheme was introduced, they could retire at 57/58 years of age which would not only incentivise but also reward hardworking people who have paid into the system for a period of 40 years and give them the opportunity to enjoy their well-earned retirement should they choose to do so.'
